CaseHistory2.name: CaseHistory2
CaseHistory2.description: Represents historical information about owner and status changes that have been made to the associated Case.

CaseId.description: The ID of the Case associated with this record.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the contact who owns the case.

PreviousUpdate.description: The date and time when the case was last updated.

Status.description: The status of the case, such as New, Closed, or Escalated.
